title: Fragment, ca. 1890
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic, velvet
Technique: plain weave with supplementary warps forming cut and uncut pile.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 142 x 63.5 cm (55 7/8 x 25 in.)
Repeat H: 118.7 cm (46 3/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Design of crown, large flower and Tudor Rose and curving straps. Gold color. Woven as a sample with header top and bottom.
